options.content:
## Merged PRs and OpenShift CI Success Rate (Daily)

**What it shows**
- **Merged PRs (bars)**: daily count of merged PRs for the selected repos and base branches.
- **Pipeline success rate (line)**: daily percent of OpenShift CI job runs that succeeded, computed as **SUCCESS / (SUCCESS + FAILURE)**.

**How it is computed**
- Both series are grouped by day and filtered by the dashboard time range.
- Success rate excludes **ABORTED** jobs and is filtered by **Job Name** and **Event Type**.
- The line uses the right axis (0â€“100%).

**Drilldown**
- Click a bar to see the list of PRs merged on that day in the table below.

panels.description: Daily merged PR volume and daily OpenShift CI success rate

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroup(pr.merged_date, '1d') as time, COUNT(*) as merged_prs FROM lake.pull_requests pr WHERE pr.merged_date IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date) AND pr.base_repo_id IN (${repo_id}) AND pr.base_ref REGEXP '${base_ref:regex}' GROUP BY $__timeGroup(pr.merged_date, '1d') ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeGroup(j.finished_at, '1d') as time, ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN j.result = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 WHEN j.result = 'FAILURE' THEN 0 ELSE NULL END) * 100, 2) as pipeline_success_rate FROM lake.ci_test_jobs j INNER JOIN lake.repos r ON CONCAT(j.organization, '/', j.repository) = r.name WHERE $__timeFilter(j.finished_at) AND j.job_type = 'prow' AND j.result IN ('SUCCESS', 'FAILURE') AND r.id IN (${repo_id}) AND j.job_name IN (${job_name}) AND j.trigger_type IN (${event_type}) GROUP BY $__timeGroup(j.finished_at, '1d') ORDER BY time

panels.title: Merged PRs and OpenShift CI Success Rate (Daily)

targets.rawSql: SELECT CONCAT('#', CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pr.url, '/', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) as pr_number, pr.title, pr.url as pr_url, pr.merged_date FROM lake.pull_requests pr WHERE pr.merged_date IS NOT NULL AND pr.base_repo_id IN (${repo_id}) AND pr.base_ref REGEXP '${base_ref:regex}' AND (('$drill_day' = '' AND $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)) OR ('$drill_day' != '' AND DATE(pr.merged_date) = STR_TO_DATE('$drill_day', '%Y-%m-%d'))) ORDER BY pr.merged_date DESC LIMIT 200

list.definition: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from repos where id like 'github%'
list.label: Repo
list.name: repo_id
list.query: select concat(name, '--', id) as text from repos where id like 'github%'

list.definition: select distinct base_ref from pull_requests where base_ref is not null and base_ref != '' order by base_ref
list.label: Merge Target Branch
list.name: base_ref
list.query: select distinct base_ref from pull_requests where base_ref is not null and base_ref != '' order by base_ref

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT j.job_name FROM ci_test_jobs j INNER JOIN repos r ON CONCAT(j.organization, '/', j.repository) = r.name WHERE j.job_type = 'prow' AND j.job_name IS NOT NULL AND j.job_name != '' AND r.id IN (${repo_id}) ORDER BY j.job_name
list.label: Job Name
list.name: job_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT j.job_name FROM ci_test_jobs j INNER JOIN repos r ON CONCAT(j.organization, '/', j.repository) = r.name WHERE j.job_type = 'prow' AND j.job_name IS NOT NULL AND j.job_name != '' AND r.id IN (${repo_id}) ORDER BY j.job_name

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT j.trigger_type as event_type FROM ci_test_jobs j INNER JOIN repos r ON CONCAT(j.organization, '/', j.repository) = r.name WHERE j.job_type = 'prow' AND j.trigger_type IS NOT NULL AND j.trigger_type != '' AND r.id IN (${repo_id}) AND j.job_name IN (${job_name}) ORDER BY j.trigger_type
list.label: Event Type
list.name: event_type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT j.trigger_type as event_type FROM ci_test_jobs j INNER JOIN repos r ON CONCAT(j.organization, '/', j.repository) = r.name WHERE j.job_type = 'prow' AND j.trigger_type IS NOT NULL AND j.trigger_type != '' AND r.id IN (${repo_id}) AND j.job_name IN (${job_name}) ORDER BY j.trigger_type

title: Merged PRs and OpenShift CI Success Rate (Daily)
